title: Review Inventory Obsolescence Reserve
description: An operational auditor reviews the process for identifying slow-moving inventory and calculating the necessary reserve.

tasks.description: Obtain the detailed inventory aging report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has the data showing how long each inventory item has been in stock.

tasks.description: Analyze the report to identify items with no sales in the last 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of potentially obsolete inventory is generated.

tasks.description: Recalculate the required obsolescence reserve based on the policy and compare it to the amount booked by the finance team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds that the reserve is understated and recommends an adjustment.
